title: Tuna and Apple Salad
ingredients: ['2 (185g) tins tuna, drained', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise or more if needed', '1 small apple, peeled, cored and chopped', '1/4 small onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon sweet pickle', '1/2 teaspoon dill', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
